attributes.action: Raise personal allowance to ensure pensioners pay no tax on state pensions
attributes.additional_details: Pensioners work all their lives for a small state pension, taxing it is unfair
attributes.background: its unfair that pensioners who only receive state pensions pay tax. we need a pensioner's personal allowance to ensure pensioners do not pay tax when the only income is a state pension

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Introduce new tax code for state pensioners with double the personal allowance
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740671
